channel.title: CVE Feed for Mirantis -- bored-agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mirantis -- bored-agent

item.title: CVE-2022-0270|2024-09-16T18:09:09.262Z -- mirantis -- bored-agent
item.description: Prior to v0.6.1, bored-agent failed to sanitize incoming kubernetes impersonation headers allowing a user to override assigned user name and groups.
